pages.summary: This is a website made from hugo web framework. The theme is Hugo-Ficurinia. It is highly customizable, and the instructions to customize are quite clear. Although there is a copyright logo at the bottom that can’t be removed from editing config files, you can easily remove it by editing footer.html in the layout section of the theme.
pages.text: this is a website made from hugo web framework. the theme is hugo-ficurinia. it is highly customizable, and the instructions to customize are quite clear. although there is a copyright logo at the bottom that can’t be removed from editing config files, you can easily remove it by editing footer.html in the layout section of the theme.
pages.title: About
